description.ko: 유기적 생명과 디지털 구조의 교차점을 탐구하며, DNA와 코드가 생물 발광의 활기찬 디스플레이로 수렴되는 미래형 표본을 보여줍니다.
description.en: An exploration of the intersection between organic life and digital architecture, featuring a futuristic specimen where DNA and code converge in a vibrant display of bioluminescence.

prompt: Hyper-realistic cinematic close-up of 'FLORA-9', a synthetic bioluminescent orchid with translucent petals displaying moving digital data streams, fiber-optic glowing stamen, microchip patterns etched into organic leaves, floating holographic pollen particles, deep forest background with neon teal and violet atmospheric lighting, 8k resolution, photorealistic botanical cyberpunk.
